attributes.action: provide every driver with a black box regardless of age
attributes.additional_details: between 1800 and 3000 people a year are killed on our roads and despite the speed limits people still exceed the speed putting themselves in danger as well as others. its not only young drivers who should have these, but everyone should. it would it prevent accidents and possible death
attributes.background: i believe every driver should have a black box fitted in their car regardless of age. having a black box fitted i believe will bring down the amount of accidents on our roads due to people speeding

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

There are already plans to introduce speed limiting devices in all vehicles sold from 2022, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling for speed limiting technology to be introduced before 2022.
